channel.title: What Pisses you off the most in RS?
channel.description:
Ok this one time me and my clan were going to fight the Kalphitequeen. We make it to her she hits one of them and they all teleport! Im like WTF! :mad: So im standing there with a rune defender abbysal whip and stuff she keeps hitting stuff on me no teleport so im like WTF! So i ask you
WHAT PISSES YOU OFF?

item.title: What Pisses you off the most in RS?
item.dc:creator: @Knyfer Knyfer
item.description:
@Knyfer wrote:

The noobs that spam and continue to spam while standing in a single bank with very few people in it (such as Yanille), mainly saying “buying instert nooby item here!!!1!one!!”

I think after the first 2 or 3 times saying it, they would get the point and leave, but no, they keep saying it.

One thing I actually like about RS — the ignore list. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: What Pisses you off the most in RS?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

well this does piss me off but it makes me laugh everytime i think about it

alright me and my friend made a clan (after this it died) and we decided we would round about about 25 people and go pking a week. well we all were 90+ as it was a 90+ clan and ended up going with like 15 people so we though we would own you know? well it ended up that we ran into another clan in 45 wild it was funny being the only ancient because pkers seem to hate them… well basically is was 50 vs 15 so we lost. lol later we found out that this lvl 100 bsed us he lured us the entire time. well in the end it was funny but i lost around 600k =\ all in all about 5m lost… if you saw it you would laugh at it it was freakin funny .

Read full topic

@not2good wrote:

Got_Shine:

item.source: What Pisses you off the most in RS?

item.title: What Pisses you off the most in RS?
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

I hate paranoid players. Like one time some guy on f2p asked me if I was a member (I was weairng a members item) and I said yes. He said he was a member and he wanted me to prove that I was one too so I said “come over to world 41 and I’ll show you” Then he says “hell no, you’re gonna hack me” And I say “Wtf? I don’t even know you” And he continues asking me to prove that I was a member and I continue to tell him to come to world 41 with me, and he continues to say I’m gonna hack him. If you ask me that’s pretty paranoid.

Read full topic

if im in a bank selling death runes or something, some noob coems up to me asking if i want to sell my dbax to him. I say no fuck off and tell them that if i was sellign my dbax then i would say selling dbax instaed of sellign death runes. there brain cant understand so they start wodnering why im so pissed.
